snippet.title: FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS | Summer Game Fest 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
#FF7EC #FF7EverCrisis #FF7 #FFVII 

FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS is now recruiting for pre-registration, as well as for the closed beta test*!

Pre-registration Info: https://en.ffviiec.com/pre-registration/ 

Closed Beta Test*: https://en.ffviiec.com/ 

The Latest Installment in the legendary FINAL FANTASY VII RPG Series. Relive the most memorable moments from FFVII and experience the journey of a young hero Sephiroth. Experience both classic and new stories within the FFVII universe presented in a retro-style look combined with modern, beautifully rendered graphics, that’s easily accessible on the go. Team up your favorite characters and customize each one with iconic gear and weapons to defeat powerful opponents in Solo or Co-op battle mode. 

Latest Info: 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS Official site：https://en.ffviiec.com/ 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS Official Twitter：https://twitter.com/FFVII_EC_EN 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS Official Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/FinalFantasyVIIEC 

Summary: 
TITLE：FINAL FANTASY Ⅶ EVER CRISIS 
GENRE：RPG 
PLATFORM：iOS／Android 
PRICE：Free-to-play（With in-app purchases） 

*The closed beta test will be open to Google Play and residents of the US or Canada only. For more details, please refer to the link above. 

© SQUARE ENIX Powered by Applibot
